title: [I/A] King’s Raid #22 萬聖節活動未開跑，Skin先賣

replies.msg:
Sever【Asia】
需入公會嘅



King`s Raid(簡稱KR)
橫向類型遊戲
戰鬥畫面打擊感強，角色精美
技能、職業種類多各有用途
玩家可以組合屬於自己既隊伍



ANDROID
https://apps.qoo-app.com/app/4943

IOS
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/kings-raid/id1097735195

已經收到由 香港 巴打提供嘅美國AC
如有需要借用可以聯絡


所以攻略僅供參考
麻煩各巴絲睇完都理性分折一下
其他無推薦到嘅英依然可以玩
冷門唔代表廢
依隻驚最好玩嘅喺組合
零課麻煩唔好跟風推薦玩乜就跟乜
到時唔夠材料先嚟棄
然後RAID撞到啪啪聲
完

【LIHKG】King's Raid 新手入門
【最新收錄 底起被起 巴打嘅完美材料攻略】


【LIHKG】King’s Raid 各職專武繁中翻譯


【LIHKG】King’s Raid 全人物覺醒表 v1.2【繁中版】


【LIHKG】King’s Raid 英雄評價表【連登版】


【King’s Raid】 各英詳細介紹表(包括技能T1-5點法、裝備屬性、符文等)


Q: 2,3,5星券揀咩角色好呀?(5星為活動券,通常係活動期間登入夠7日就有,每日重置時間為香港時間零晨1點)
A:隊形一般會選擇1坦2輸出1奶
2星券,紅框為首選(Gau係戰士,可做坦可做物理輸出,Kaulah為牧師,用途較廣)


3星券,紅框為冇活動5星券既首選DPS,紫框為有活動5星券首選多控場副DPS,綠框為有活動5星券可選角色


5星券,紅框為首選DPS,綠框為次選DPS


講就講曬,仲有選擇困難既就問你自己細佬啦

Q:咁其他角色呢?唔揀係咪即係廢?
A:唔係,大部分角色都有各自既用途同玩法,有D係打龍勁,有D係PVP勁,有D係打BOSS勁,有D係推圖勁,仲有分前期角同後期角,不過玩耐左就會明,只係開頭揀勁既DPS黎用姐

Q:我個隊應該點配呀?
A:一隊入面一般配置就係1坦2輸出1奶,其中一個輸出會係拎黎控場(控場技能即係CC)用既副DPS,因為控場可以打斷敵人既技能,例如係敵人吟唱時間你暈佢,佢就冇得出依招技,係PVP黎講甚至會令對手冇埋Mana(Mana=出技cost),進而令你較容易獲勝

Q：需唔需要刷首抽架？
A：冇首抽依回事，角色可以用自選卷,用石買同係酒館到溝返黎，專武就每日免費抽都有機會中

Q：咩英好用？
Ａ：評價表：https://goo.gl/KRzAey
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YfHeybcKj3R3Qq6Tzg1nJFiH9OYAcOxHD3WIJxBhrPk/edit

Q：D武器裝備點搞啊？點分？
A：專武T10(得武器有專武 - 一開始會送男劍專武一把)
金(RAID/商店金抽/紅石抽)
紅(主線HARD/HELL MODE/RAID/商店金抽/紅石抽)
紫(主線HARD/HELL MODE/RAID/商店金抽/紅石抽)
藍(分解)
綠白(分解)

Q：卡主線點搞？
A：試下睇一次自動打，咩原因卡先
如果喺唔夠力嘅就升下角升下裝
如果喺死喺Boss出技嘅話可以等隻王出技嘅時候出CC技斷佢

Q：幾LV封頂？
Ａ：80，英雄1至80級所需經驗 https://goo.gl/ZTSaJj

如有更多問題可詳見【LIHKG】King's Raid 新手入門【By湯丸】或回覆
即有專人回答您

[Weekly Maintenance] 19th Oct 2017



Greetings, Raiders
This week's maintenance will be on 19th Oct 2017
Please check the details below.

----------------------------

[Maintenance Schedule]

Duration: Thurs, 19th Oct 2017
America Server: 01:00-04:00 (UTC -4)
Asia Server: 12:00-15:00 (UTC +7)
EU Server: 07:00-10:00 (UTC +2)

** Please note that you cannot access to the game during the maintenance.
We will try our best to end it in time.

[Maintenance Details]

▶Chapter.7 Hell Mode will be added
- You can open Hell Mode by clearing 7-12 with 3 Stars

▶Halloween Event Dungeon Open
- Halloween background in Orvel during Halloween event period

★ Chat Limit Regulations will be added
- Hate Speech, Excessive swearing
- Actions that can cause humiliation via obscene or sexually explicit banter
- Racism and other discriminatory languages towards certain country (area), religion, race,
and challenged
- Threats, harassment, insults towards certain nations, tribes or people
- Use of unethical, excessive swearing and threats, that can cause fear
- Misconducts such as spreading rumors, political issues, and misuse of in-game chat for
Advertising, Spamming & Scamming

** Consequences of Misconduct **
:: Warnings

- 1st: Chat ban for 2 hours
- 2nd: Chat ban for 1 day (24 hours)
- 3rd: Chat ban for 3 days (72 hours)
- 4th: Account ban for 1 day (24 hours)
- 5th: Account ban for 3 days (72 hours)

** Chat Ban Status: You will be banned from chat as listed above if you go against listed
regulations.


▶ Hero Balance Patch
- Balance patch on several heroes
** Heroes: Selene, Rephy, Pavel, Demia, Mitra, Lewisia, Arch

More details will be included in the Patch Note

▶Bug Fixes
- More details will be included in the Patch Note

▶ UI Change & Revamps
- More details will be included in the Patch Note

[Event Details]

▶Halloween Jack-o’-Lantern Box
:; Period: 19th Oct after maintenance – Thurs, 9th Nov before maintenance
** Please note that the event period may change if the maintenance schedule changes
:: Details: You can purchase the box max 5 times a day.
- Halloween Jack-o’-Lantern Box
- Item list will be included in the Patch Note

▶ All-In-One Package
:: Period: 19th Oct after maintenance – 23:59, Wed 25th Oct 2017
** Please note that the event period may change if the maintenance schedule changes
:: Details: Can be purchased only 1 time per account.
- 5 Star Hero Ticket x1: You can select 5 star Hero, among the heroes those who appear in
Hero’s Inn.
- Costume Ticket x1: You can select between School Uniforms and Beach Costumes
- Special Item Summon x3

▶Special Item Summon Event
:: Period: 19th Oct after maintenance – 23:59, Wed 25th Oct 2017
** Please note that the event period may change if the maintenance schedule changes

:: Details: Various reward items will be given based on how many times you’ve used
Special Item Summon x10

- Every pull: Mysterious Fragment x50
- 5 pulls: 7 kinds of Essence x20 each
- 10 pulls: Artifact Piece x1000
- 15 pulls: Unique Weapon Ticket x1
- 20 pulls: Artifact Ticket x1

** All reward items will be given only once on each pull, and Mysterious Fragments will not be
given if you pull more than 20 times.
** Stone of Infinity will be given on every 5 more pulls after 20th pull

-------------------------------------------------

More details will be uploaded with the Patch Note.

Thank you
GM Orvel
